name: use-scroll-lock
description: Lock and unlock scrolling on an element or the page.
title: guara hooks

properties.name: ref
properties.description: The ref of the element to lock scroll on. If not provided, locks the document body.

features.title: Target Behavior
bullets: The hook accepts a ref to an element or defaults to the document body.

features.title: Cleanup
bullets: Restores the original overflow style on unmount.

features.title: Performance & Safety
bullets: Uses useRef to store the original overflow value.
